description:
The DIY Calculator application is designed to help you estimate the amount of materials you need for common DIY jobs.  It has 4 calculation options:painting, wallpapering, tiling and flooring.  

It will prove beneficial to the general handyman trying to calculate how much paint he needs when painting his bedroom or the professional calculating materials and costings for clients.

All you need to do is enter the dimensions of the job at hand and the calculator does the rest!  

It is simple to use and fast and will help you save money, as you will have less wastage of materials.

Features:
- Paint Calculator
- Wallpaper Calculator
- Flooring Calculator
- Tile Calculator
- Measurements can be entered in either feet and inches or metres and centimetres

So whether you are doing general diy or renovations don't get left with surplus materials.

NOTE: The calculator is for estimation purposes only.
